statements: SELECT athlete_name, finishing_time FROM marathon_races WHERE ranking = 1;
SELECT * FROM marathon_races WHERE athlete_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY finishing_time DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, ranking FROM marathon_races ORDER BY ranking, athlete_name;
SELECT * FROM marathon_races WHERE ranking BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY finishing_time;
SELECT athlete_name, ranking, finishing_time FROM marathon_races WHERE finishing_time < '03:30:00';
SELECT race_id, athlete_name, finishing_time, ranking FROM marathon_races ORDER BY finishing_time DESC, athlete_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT athlete_name, ranking FROM marathon_races WHERE finishing_time < '03:30:00';
SELECT * FROM marathon_races WHERE athlete_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT race_id, athlete_name, ranking FROM marathon_races WHERE ranking > 3 ORDER BY ranking ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, finishing_time FROM marathon_races WHERE race_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM marathon_results WHERE ranking <= 3;
SELECT participant_name, ranking FROM marathon_results ORDER BY ranking DESC;
SELECT participant_name, finishing_time FROM marathon_results WHERE participant_id = 101;
SELECT participant_name, finishing_time FROM marathon_results WHERE finishing_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM marathon_history WHERE location = 'New York' AND total_participants > 500;
SELECT * FROM marathon_results ORDER BY finishing_time DESC, ranking ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, ranking FROM marathon_results WHERE participant_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM marathon_results WHERE finishing_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT participant_name, ranking FROM marathon_results WHERE participant_name LIKE 'J%' AND ranking <= 10;
SELECT race_name, location, total_participants FROM marathon_history WHERE race_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_participants DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marathon_races;
SELECT race_name, race_date FROM marathon_races ORDER BY race_date DESC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country FROM athletes WHERE athlete_country = 'USA';
SELECT race_name, race_distance FROM marathon_races WHERE race_distance > 42.195;
SELECT athlete_name, finishing_time FROM athletes JOIN race_results ON athletes.athlete_id = race_results.athlete_id ORDER BY finishing_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM marathon_races ORDER BY race_date DESC, race_distance ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country, athlete_birthdate FROM athletes WHERE athlete_country='USA';
SELECT race_name, race_location, race_date, race_distance FROM marathon_races WHERE race_distance > 42;
SELECT athlete_name, athlete_country, athlete_gender, athlete_birthdate FROM athletes ORDER BY athlete_name;

SELECT rr.result_id, rr.finishing_time, rr.ranking, ar.athlete_name, mr.race_name FROM race_results rr JOIN athletes ar ON rr.athlete_id = ar.athlete_id JOIN marathon_races mr ON rr.race_id = mr.race_id ORDER BY rr.ranking ASC, rr.finishing_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM marathon_results ORDER BY athlete_name DESC;
SELECT athlete_id, athlete_name, race_date FROM marathon_results WHERE ranking > 3;
SELECT athlete_name, finishing_time FROM marathon_results WHERE finishing_time < '03:30:00';
SELECT athlete_name, nationality FROM marathon_results INNER JOIN athlete_details ON marathon_results.athlete_id = athlete_details.athlete_id;
SELECT course_name, city FROM marathon_courses WHERE distance_km >= 42.195;
SELECT athlete_name, finishing_time, ranking FROM marathon_results ORDER BY ranking DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT athlete_name, race_date, finishing_time FROM marathon_results WHERE race_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT athlete_name, nationality, age, gender FROM marathon_results JOIN athlete_details ON marathon_results.athlete_id = athlete_details.athlete_id WHERE age <= 30;
SELECT course_name, distance_km, elevation_gain_m FROM marathon_courses WHERE city = 'New York' AND distance_km > 42;
SELECT athlete_name, course_name, finishing_rank FROM marathon_results JOIN race_results ON marathon_results.athlete_id = race_results.athlete_id WHERE completion_status = true;
SELECT athlete_name, country FROM athletes WHERE country='Kenya';
SELECT race_name, race_location FROM races ORDER BY race_date DESC;
SELECT country_name, COUNT(athlete_id) AS total_athletes FROM countries JOIN athletes ON countries.country_id = athletes.country GROUP BY country_name;

SELECT athlete_name, race_name, finishing_time FROM athletes JOIN race_results ON athletes.athlete_id = race_results.athlete_id JOIN races ON race_results.race_id = races.race_id WHERE finishing_time < '03:30:00';
SELECT athlete_name, finishing_time, ranking FROM athletes JOIN race_results ON athletes.athlete_id = race_results.athlete_id WHERE ranking <= 3 ORDER BY ranking ASC;
SELECT athlete_name, country FROM athletes WHERE athlete_id = 1;
SELECT race_name, race_location, race_date FROM races WHERE race_id = 2;
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_id = 3;

SELECT athlete_name, country, race_name, race_location, finishing_time, ranking FROM athletes, races, race_results WHERE athlete_id = 1 AND race_id = 2 AND athletes.athlete_id = race_results.athlete_id AND races.race_id = race_results.race_id;

SELECT athlete_name, country, race_name, race_location, finishing_time, ranking FROM athletes JOIN races ON athletes.athlete_id = 1 AND races.race_id = 2 JOIN race_results ON athletes.athlete_id = race_results.athlete_id AND races.race_id = race_results.race_id;
